title: Why are there Diamonds etc in my normals?
body: I am super shit at LoL why does it think I should play with diamonds lol.

replies.body: As far as I know there is a different MMR rating for Ranked and for Normals. I'm sure they're mustbe somewhat connected but a lot of people play pretty much just Ranked games. As a result even if they are Diamond in Ranked they may only have 200 or so Normal wins so their MMR wouldn't be that high for normals. Also just unlucky if they're queued with some Bronze, they can't play Ranked with their Bronze mates so they have to play normals, I'm sure you'd be getting some on your team too just unlucky if you're laning against one.
Just learn from them, or destroy their boosted asses.
I get put with about 2 golds every game, quite often a plat or two, it just means you wreck in normals.
It is possible that you are at their skill level.
Diamonds are 9/10 trash anyways, just destroy them. Half of them are boosted (not even joking Riot crack down on boosting Jesus Christ)

because normal match making is fu.cked. Thats why i play ranked for people in my elo


normals is when i want to fu.ck around
